titleStmt.title: A reply to a most untrue relation made and set forth in print by certaine vintners, in excuse of their wine project.
titleStmt.author: Kilvert, Richard, d. 1649.

notesStmt.note: Richard Kilvert, on trial for his part in a questionable deal with the vintner's company concerning the wine monopoly, wrote this reply in his own defence. --Cf. DNB.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
